testCase.name: Parser handles .if/.else syntax correctly
testCase.description: Parser should successfully parse .if/.else constructs without 'Unknown opcode' errors

testCase.name: Parser fails on conditional constructs
testCase.description: Parser currently cannot handle .if/.else syntax and should show parsing errors

testCase.name: Parser does not support nested conditionals
testCase.description: Parser should show errors for nested .if statements

testCase.name: Symbol completion works in conditional blocks
testCase.description: Symbols should be available for completion inside conditional blocks

testCase.name: Hover information for conditional symbols
testCase.description: Hovering over symbols in conditionals should show information
